otherErrors.minLoginError: Login must be more than 3 letters
otherErrors.minNameError: Name must be more than 2 letters

homePage.aboutTitle: Our Project Management application is the success of your team's work.
homePage.aboutText: By managing your project with our application, you get the following benefits:

aboutItems.2: - Unlimited number of tasks in the project
aboutItems.5: - Ability to add and remove tasks at any time
aboutItems.6: - Ability to save and load projects

homePage.heroText: By dividing the project into small tasks, you simplify the work process and the ability to divide the project between employees of different levels, capabilities and qualifications.
homePage.description: This project was made as part of the Angular course at the RSSchool online school.
homePage.title: Our team:
